MeasurementToolMetadata.LongName: Exclusionary Survey follow-up: Language and ADHD-Related Questions
MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Parent follow-up survey about their child's foreign language usage and developmental disorder diagnosis status

ADHD_diagnosis_status.Description: Is your child diagnosed with ADD/ADHD (Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder)?

time_other_language_spoken_to_child.Description: What percentage of time is a language besides English spoken to your child?

time_other_language_spoken_by_child.Description: What percentage of time does your child speak a language besides English?

language_spoken_at_home.Description: What languages do you speak at home (choose all that apply)?

speech_language_evaluation.Description: Has your child received any professional speech/language evaluations in the past 14 months?

name_of_diagnosis_speech_language.Description: name of diagnosis (if applicable) from speech/language evaluations

learning_disability_evaluation.Description: Has your child received any professional evaluations for a learning or educational disability in the past 14 months?

name_of_diagnosis_learning_disability.Description: name of diagnosis (if applicable) from evaluations for a learning or educational disability

occupational_therapist_evaluation.Description: Has your child received any professional evaluations from an occupational therapist in the past 14 months?

name_of_diagnosis_OT.Description: name of diagnosis (if applicable) from evaluations from an occupational therapist

psychological_counseling_evaluation.Description: Has your child received any professional psychological or counseling evaluations in the past 14 months?

name_of_diagnosis_psychological_counseli.Description: name of diagnosis (if applicable) from psychological or counseling evaluations

physical_evaluation.Description: Has your child received any professional physical therapy evaluations in the past 14 months?

name_of_diagnosis_physical.Description: name of diagnosis (if applicable) from physical therapy evaluations
